Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product holds immense value for us, but considering its worth to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your requirements. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $10,000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a valuable asset but also to benefit from our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you decide to proceed with this exclusive offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
